channel.title: What The Hell Do You Want? [Dodian Source]
channel.description:
Hey Mopar Members.
I recently released a dodian source, which i cleaned out a bit for the people who wanted to start clean and didn't know certain packet numbers.
Now, since most of the people didn't appreciate that, I'm gonna ask you. What do you want me to do?
I have a dodian source, and i'm gonna do my work on that. So tell me, with my dodian source what do u want me to do. Whether it be a skill or soemthing else. tell me what you want me to code, i'll code it on dodian/devo 7 and release it in this section as a dodian/devolution 7.0 function/piece of work.
So just leave a msg with what you would like to see here, then i'll take some into conisderation. [b]Thanks.[/b]

item.title: What The Hell Do You Want? [Dodian Source]
item.dc:creator: @Matrix_Pride Matrix Pride
item.description:
@Matrix_Pride wrote:

AAaahhhh i see. my bad =P

Read full topic
item.source: What The Hell Do You Want? [Dodian Source]

item.title: What The Hell Do You Want? [Dodian Source]
item.dc:creator: @Zelda_Knight Zelda Knight
item.description:
@Zelda_Knight wrote:

Ok, i didn’t mean i am going to code the dodian server and releas eit.

I am sorry if you misunderstood.
I said i am coding skills etc to release seperatly, on dodian source.

Eg. i code herblore and release the codes as “[DODIAN] Full Herblore”

Sorry if you mis-understood.

Read full topic
item.source: What The Hell Do You Want? [Dodian Source]

item.title: What The Hell Do You Want? [Dodian Source]
item.dc:creator: @Matrix_Pride Matrix Pride
item.description:
@Matrix_Pride wrote:

well thats kind of an understatement, players want EVERY skill done. not just a couple, and about the economy thing. Make it hard cash so when you get a rare, you know your l337 LOL!

Read full topic
item.source: What The Hell Do You Want? [Dodian Source]

item.title: What The Hell Do You Want? [Dodian Source]
item.dc:creator: @Zelda_Knight Zelda Knight
item.description:
@Zelda_Knight wrote:

Good economy?

There are different opinions on good economy. Shop prices, and also player trade prices, it depends on who is playing for the economy tbh.

Also, I’m asking what skill people want done.

I’ll do the skill, and release it in the development section.

Read full topic
item.source: What The Hell Do You Want? [Dodian Source]

item.title: What The Hell Do You Want? [Dodian Source]
item.dc:creator: @Matrix_Pride Matrix Pride
item.description:
@Matrix_Pride wrote:

make it have a good economy, LEAST commands as possible, and Large world content, add most skills. thats what most people are looking for now… even though its a whole lot to ask for =]

Read full topic
